title.native: Kaiser: The Greatest Footballer Never to Play Football

directors.name: Louis Myles
directors.nationality: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

synopsis.native: Carlos "Kaiser" Henrique Raposo was a professional footballer. But he never actually played a game. By convincing others of his abilities (with help from journalist friends) he moved from club to club, avoiding football but partying hard.
